name: Do
description: '''Dominique Rijpma van Hulst''' ({{IPA|nl|doːmiˈnik ˈrɛipmaː vɑn ˈɦʏlst}}; born 7 September 1981) is a Dutch singer known by her stage name '''Do''' ({{IPAc-en|d|oʊ}} {{respell|DOH}}). She is best known for singing the vocals of "[[Heaven (Bryan Adams song)|Heaven]]", [[DJ Sammy]]'s worldwide top 10-hit in 2002–2003, a cover of [[Heaven (Bryan Adams song)|the 1980s hit]] of the same name by [[Bryan Adams]].
